subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. said that it would delay a $2,000 stipend for athletes until it can be reconsidered at January’s convention, after 125 colleges requested the delay.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. said that it would delay a $2,000 stipend for athletes until it can be reconsidered at January’s convention, after 125 colleges requested the delay.
